Articles.Content:
Hi, virus.

That's a nice ability to interact with my bodily cells you have there.

It'd be a real shame if i were a methane based life-form.

The next poster plays Mortal Kombat in real life, and loses.
I pull the plug on the mortal Kombat simulator, then rewrite it to drop the next poster into a standard KSP n00b launch

I'm Jeb. I don't make mistakes.

The next poster will be teleported to the singularity of a black hole.

I am also a black hole, creating an even larger black hole

The smell of onions fill the next posters nose as Shrek appears

No.

I will do something to the next person.

you cant, because I'm not here!

the next poster will be teleported into a house filled with lasers
They were actually detector lasers, that activated the launch of an ICBM, i hack it and send it to the next poster

I build a spaceplane and fly to the ICBM where I disassemble it.

Now the individual parts of the missile are flying at the next poster.

I stare them down and come out of it unscathed.

I calmly stab the next person through the abdomen.

I'm a robot, so I don't feel pain. Also the knife goes through my nerve gas compartment

the next poster will get a high fived with a chair

High five, chair! *slaps on the chair*

The next poster is about to get crushed by a 5-ton elephant.

It happens, but in space!

The next poster will be shoved off a dock and be swallowed whole by a great white shark

No water, so the shark dies. I have a parachute, so I live.

The next poster will be duct taped to Sedna, and left to die.

After living a long, full life in the peaceful solitude of my space habitat (which included a sharp set of knives for cutting duct tape), I finally die.

Before I die, I teleport the next poster into the core of VY Canis Majoris.

Doesn't say when, so i blow VY canis majoris. Good luck finding the core.

The next poster shall be consumed by the toilet paper monster!

Paper isn't immune to H2O!

However the next poster drowns.

Almost. Almost drowns. You never specified how deep the water was, so I'll just roll out of this puddle you so rudely pushed me into.

I fire dart tipped with lethal poison at the next poster.

I grab it mid-flight right before it hits me, and throw into Mt. doom.

Next poster is teleported to my homeplanet, Venus.

I've spent years building an immunity to iocaine powder that poison, so it has no effect.

I go back in a time machine and kill the next poster's parents before they conceive.

The poison happens to be bacterial in nature (i.e. Anthrax), and since I happen to be taking antibiotics because of an infected cut, the poison has no effect.

I swap all the atoms of iodine in the next poster's body with astatine, making them radioactive.

EDIT: Ninja'd

Biggest ninja in history.

The next poster is teleported to my homeplanet, Venus's surface.

I'm a robot made of tungsten.

The next poster will be floating a foot away from a supernova about to happen.

I use all the boosters I had with me at the time (you would be surprised how many boosters I have with me at any given time in the case of an emergency where a ship needs more thrust) to boost me away from the star right before it explodes.

I accidentally crash into the next poster at unprecedented speeds.

FORCE FIELD

The next poster......... will be killed by my lack of a descriptive attack.

I know what it is, and you failed due to my lack of a descriptive escape. (Surprise, surprise!)

The next poster bumped into the previous poster.
